data.title: Exciting employment opportunities
data.meta_description: Become an Ignitioner today, visit Ignition Careers to view all vacancies available right now, and apply right here online for your dream job.
data.text:
Our business decisions are data-driven. By implementing various Technology platforms, we are able to capture data that has been previously untouchable. This enrichment of data creates a better understanding of our customers, our people and our operations.

Boasting a hybrid of agency and corporate feel, our in-house Marketing Department develops and drives the growth of our brands. Our team of passionate marketers encompasses a wide range of professional skillsets, including: strategy; design; communications; social media management and campaign management.

Collecting money has become a science at the Ignition Group. Our A.I. collection solutions allow us to make smarter engagements with customers, offering more ways to pay than ever before. Constant improvement of collections efficiencies means that we can collect more money at a lower cost; making our organisation one of the most optimised collections engines in the country.

Our People prove to be our greatest and most valued asset. Engaging and nurturing, our People Department is responsible for managing the organisation’s human capital to meet the established business objectives.

Our after-sales-service Sales Operations Department ensures efficient and timely product order fulfilment, and strict adherence to customised Service Level Agreements. From vetting to dispatch and delivery, to Installations, activations and retentions – our customers’ orders are our priority.

Our resilient Contact Centre sales experts and management teams effortlessly destroy boundaries, promoting the growth of our organisation. Sourced by target-driven Contact Centre Recruitment, our Sales Experts form a direct link between our products/services and valued customers.

Ignition’s buildings are maintained and managed by our in-house facilities department, who make sure they are kept at a standard that meets all legal, health and safety specifications.

A leading MVNE in South Africa, and home to some of the most competitive and A-grade mobile networks. Offering full-circle solutions and services, MVN-X creates more value for partners through their very own branded mobile networks.

We’re a business that not only cares for its employees, but also cares for its customers. Combining the expertise of industry prominent Actuaries, Legal and Compliance gurus and Policy Holder Services fundis, we aim to provide valuable short-term and long-term financial solutions for individuals and families.
